title: Calories in Goldfish Crackers
meta_description: Learn calories in goldfish crackers for a standard 30g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for different flavors.
assumptions: Cheddar flavor, baked; standard Pepperidge Farm variety; no added dips or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, serving size, and preparation. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 30g of Goldfish crackers provides 140 kcal, 3g protein, and 230mg sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to pretzel flavor (lower fat per 30g)
Add 1 tbsp cheddar dip per serving
Whole grain variety (slightly higher fiber, similar calories)

faqs.q: How many calories in goldfish crackers per serving?
faqs.a: About 140 calories in 30g (roughly 30 crackers) of cheddar Goldfish.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in goldfish crackers?
faqs.a: 18g carbs per 30g serving, with 1g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: Are goldfish crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 230mg sodium per 30g servingâ€”about 10% of daily value.

faqs.q: How much protein in a handful of goldfish?
Do different goldfish flavors vary in calories?
faqs.a: Slightly; cheddar is 140 kcal per 30g, pretzel about 120 kcal.
